interface.title: Interface to communicate with the LOGO. (modbus or snap7)

type.title: Type of Accessory (switch, blind, garagedoor, lightbulb)

switchGet.title: Switch Get (required for a Switch Accessory)

switchSetOn.title: Switch Set On (required for a Switch Accessory)

switchSetOff.title: Switch Set Off (required for a Switch Accessory)

switchValue.title: Switch Value (required for a Switch Accessory)
switchValue.description: Value for Switch Set On and Off

switchPushButton.title: Switch Push Button (required for a Switch Accessory)

blindSetPos.title: Blind Set Pos (required for a Blind Accessory)

blindGetPos.title: Blind Get Pos (required for a Blind Accessory)

blindGetState.title: Blind Get State (required for a Blind Accessory)

blindDigital.title: Blind Digital (required for a none Analog Blind Accessory)
blindDigital.description: 0 for Analog Control, 1 for PushButton Control

blindSetUp.title: Blind Set Up (required for a none Analog Blind Accessory)

blindSetDown.title: Blind Set Down (required for a none Analog Blind Accessory)

blindGetUpDown.title: Blind Get Up or Down (required for a none Analog Blind Accessory)
blindGetUpDown.description: Return 1 for Up or 0 for Down

blindValue.title: Blind Value (required for a none Analog Blind Accessory)
blindValue.description: Value for Blind Set Up and Down

blindPushButton.title: Blind Push Button (required for a none Analog Blind Accessory)
